column4: Please,is there i work around of launching application without using the applications menu ?
alt/f2 or use terminal
i dont know the commands,my application menu is not working for some reason and there are some applications i want to launch.
start typing the application and press tab
Its does not.
does not what?
with fi it gives me options but with application it does not.
what do you mean? i type in fi into terminal press tab several times and it gives me 40 options
are you typing it into terminal or?
with fi it gives me options too but when i type "appli" i get only appletViewer.
Yes am typing on my terminal.
well, thats all it can autocomplete
then does that mean application is not working somehow ?
just notinstalled thats alls
add/remove .
Am not that good with the terminal so i rely heavily on the application menu.
well you can add/reomve apps from terminal as well
sounds like you lost your desktop? is that right?
oh heh wait even
another option is just to reset your gnome settings
from terminal go to ~/
i moved the files but still it is not working.Sorry for bothering this much.
